events: A user submits their encrypted login credentials to the authentication endpoint.
The authentication server validates the credentials against the user database.
The system issues a short-lived JSON Web Token (JWT) for the current session.
The application redirects the user to their personalized dashboard.
The system records the successful login event in the global security audit log.
question: Arrange the following system authentication events in the correct chronological sequence.
hint: Remember that cause precedes effect, so a token can only be issued after validation is complete.
